tool_description: Routes specimens and test orders to appropriate laboratory departments and workstations based on test requirements, urgency, and workflow optimization.

specimen_id.description: Unique specimen identifier from barcode or label

test_codes.description: Array of tests to be performed on this specimen

specimen_type.description: Type of specimen: blood, urine, stool, tissue, csf, other

special_handling.description: Special handling requirements like refrigeration, light protection

processing_notes.description: Additional processing instructions or clinical notes

error_messages: Specimen not found: Invalid specimen_id or specimen not properly registered in system.
Invalid test codes: One or more test codes are not valid or not available for this specimen type.
Invalid specimen type: Specimen type must be [blood, urine, stool, tissue, csf, other].
Invalid urgency level: Urgency must be [routine, urgent, stat].
Specimen stability issue: Specimen age or handling conditions may compromise test results.
Insufficient specimen volume: Specimen volume insufficient for all requested tests.
Department unavailable: Required laboratory department is currently not accepting specimens.
usage: Provide specimen_id, test_codes, specimen_type, urgency, and collection_time to route specimen for processing. Include special_handling and processing_notes as needed.

routing_destinations.description: Laboratory departments/workstations where specimen should be sent

processing_sequence.description: Recommended order for test processing to optimize specimen use

estimated_completion.description: Expected completion time for all tests

priority_level.description: Numeric priority for workflow queue (1=highest priority)
